title: Widespread losses of pollinating insects in Britain

title_detail.value: Widespread losses of pollinating insects in Britain

summary: Many insect pollinator species are disappearing from areas of Great Britain, a new study has found. Research showed one third of wild pollinator species experienced declines in terms of areas in which they were found, while one tenth increased.

summary_detail.value: Many insect pollinator species are disappearing from areas of Great Britain, a new study has found. Research showed one third of wild pollinator species experienced declines in terms of areas in which they were found, while one tenth increased.
